title: WRIT 2GS Rhetoric & Inquiry, Global Seminar
description: Provides declarative knowledge about writing, with a special focus on writing from research, composing in multiple genres, and transferring knowledge about writing to new contexts. Taught as a Global Seminar in Ireland.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): College 1 and satisfaction of the Entry Level Writing; or College 80A, 80D, or 80F and satisfaction of the C1 requirement. Enrollment is restricted to frosh, sophomore and junior students.

class_notes: Global Seminar, applications are now closed. To inquire about any late application deadlines, emailgloballearning@ucsc.edu.
